oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Armistice announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: U.S. Army Signal Corps telegram from AEF HQ announcing the Armistice to U.S. troops at Brest, France. Telegram from a scapbook album of photographs and documents about George H. Harries. He was commender of Base Section No. 5 (U.S. facilities in and around port of Brest) from May-November 1918. He commanded the U.S. Mission in Berlin, Germany, after the Armistice.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
